sourcesContent:
import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { techstack } from "../techstack"; import "../styles.css"; import "animate.css/animate.min.css"; function Home() { const containerRef = useRef(null); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("Advance"); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(0); const pages = [ { id: "page1", animation: "animate__fadeIn" }, { id: "page2", animation: "animate__bounceInLeft" }, { id: "page3", animation: "animate__zoomIn" }, { id: "page4", animation: "animate__fadeInUp" }, { id: "page5", animation: "animate__flipInX" }, ]; useEffect(() => { const container = containerRef.current; const handleScroll = () => { const pageHeight = window.innerHeight; const currentPageIndex = Math.round(container.scrollTop / pageHeight); setCurrentPage(currentPageIndex); }; container.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => container.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); const handleCategoryChange = (category) => { setSelectedCategory(category); }; return (
{pages.map((page, index) => (
{index === 0 && (

Hi There !

About me

Pamodhya Thotahewa

Eager to contribute my expertise in frontend frameworks, modern UI/UX design, and responsive development to a forward-thinking team, while continuously learning and growing in the ever-evolving world of web development.

))}
); } export default Home;
